title: Agyar
description: From bestselling fantasy author Steven Brust comes this paranormal novel of immortality―and its price...Born over a century ago, Agyar was once a frivolous young man, before he found unwanted immortality in a woman's blood-red lips. Now he goes from woman to woman, and decade to decade, finding himself at last in an Midwestern college town, where he must choose between the seductions of salvation―and of destruction.
author: Steven Brust
